cab.content: OPERATIONSFrom:- General Plumer, Italy. Despatched 10.21 p.m. 20.12.17To:- C.I.G.S., War Office.- Received 3 a.m. 21.12.17.0.139* Today the Italian 4th Army made a very good counter-attack with fresh troops and have retaken Mt Asolone and other points. One of, our Staff Officers who has just returned from there brings a very satisfactory report on the operations, I hope they will be able to hold to the ground they have regained.
